# God's Cosmic Rhythms
## Scripture
"And God said, 'Let there be lights in the vault of the sky to separate the day from the night, and let them serve as signs to mark sacred times, and days and years.'" - Genesis 1:14

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we're reminded of God's masterful composition. The celestial rhythms, orchestrated by our Creator, bring order and beauty to our lives. The phases of the moon, the rotation of the planets, and the changing seasons all testify to God's sovereignty over time itself. Just as the cosmos operates in harmony, our lives can also be attuned to God's rhythmic grace. We can learn to discern the sacred times, marking moments of worship, rest, and celebration.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, we marvel at the celestial rhythms you've established. Help us to synchronize our lives with your divine timing, that we may discern the sacred moments and honor you in all we do. As we look up at the starry sky, remind us of your faithfulness and the promise of eternal rhythms that govern our lives. May our hearts beat in harmony with yours, and may we move in step with your sovereign plan. In Jesus' name, we pray, amen.
